entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023
